member.name: ID2D1ColorContext.GetColorSpace
member.summary: Gets the color space of the color context.
member.returns: This method returns the color space of the contained ICC profile.

member.name: ID2D1ColorContext.GetProfile
member.summary: Gets the color profile bytes for an .
member.param: When this method returns, contains the color profile.
The size of the profile buffer.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The supplied buffer was too small to accommodate the data.

member.name: ID2D1ColorContext.GetProfileSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the color profile associated with the bitmap.
member.returns: This method returns the size of the profile in bytes.

member.name: ID2D1ColorContext
member.summary: Represents a color context that can be used with an object.
